Portfolio Résumé

Hi, I'm Alex.

I'm a Software Developer from Raleigh, North Carolina. I am currently learning full stack Java development through the Barriers to Entry training program at York Solutions. In my first career I was a geologist, and since then I have been gaining a diverse set of skills in software development. This site represents my up-to-date portfolio and résumé.
